title: Who will you play wen all for one comes out

replies.body: I'm thinking nothing but Yasuos/Zeds will be played. Id like to see Lulu as she can do every role :p

Yeah but Yasuo is overplayed, People should play more different champions. 5 Mundos or 5 Poppys. Champs that are rarely seen. Of course Yasuo can do every role. He has a move that any support would die for, placing that move on a carry. Not coolio.
5 Yoricks? we could have a 10v10 melee brawl.
Hahaha that would be fucking mad! :p
agreed, overplayed by people who disgrace him

{{champion:55}} 

just be the last to go in and pentaaaaakillllllll >:)
Who ever is picked or voted, that's who I'll play.
Azir cos he is my fave, Kindred because they will be instapicked by everyone every game. Tahm Kench so there can be massive frogception, and many more
lol, every tahm eats eachother till all in the 1 frog

urgod again.
I want to try new GP barrels, just get a huge line of them and detonate them, also see if we can do barron with only barrels.

I've never played this game mode, so I'm excited!
I'd play Ahri {{champion:103}}
Normally late game champs work well.. You want strong duelists if i remember correctly.. Can't wait though. When is it coming out?
im thinking 5.20 as its on pbe now and a fun champ is {{champion:74}} op q
